Intro:
Undertale
Story A long time ago, two races ruled peacefully over the Earth: HUMANS and MONSTERS.
One day, a terrible war broke out between the two races.
After a long battle, the humans were victorious.
They sealed the monsters underground with a magical spell.
Many years later...
MT. Ebbot 201X
Legends say that those who climb the mountain never return. Seeking refuge from the rainy weather, the child enters a cave and discovers an enormous hole. Moving closer to get a better look… the child falls in. Now, our story begins.
